thread.title: How to be Fabulous

title: How to be Fabulous
text: Story Published: Oct 8, 2015 at 1:20 PM EDT Story Updated: Oct 8, 2015 at 1:20 PM EDT How to be Fabulous (in an unfabulous world) Sara Caliva brings her blog to life in this honest and sometimes irreverent one-woman show that challenges you to be the weirdest version of yourself. Get ready to laugh and cry as she presents you with her completely made up phases for success and uniquely snarky view of the world. The Central New York Playhouse presents as part of our One Night series. October 9th, 2015 at 8pm. Tickets are $10 Advance, $12 door.
